flawed_nl_solution:
He dropped 2 cantaloupes and had 8 left over at the end of the day, so he sold 30 - 2 - 8 = <<30-2-8=23>>23 cantaloupes.
Three honeydews were rotten, and he had 9 left at the end of the day, so he sold 27 - 3 - 9 = <<27-3-9=15>>15 honeydews.
He sold 23 cantaloupes * $2/cantaloupe = $<<23*2=46>>46 in cantaloupes
He also sold 15 honeydews * $3/honeydew = $<<15*3=45>>45 in honeydews.
Altogether he made $46 + $45 = $<<46+45=91>>91
#### 91

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 23. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
